# Testing/MCMC

## Tuesday

- [ ] CDF vs. PDF

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| error: false

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

# plot the CDF and PDF of a normal distribution
x <- seq(-4, 4, length.out = 1000)
y <- dnorm(x)
z <- pnorm(x)

df <- data.frame(x, y, z)

ggplot(df, aes(x)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = y), color = "blue") +
  geom_line(aes(y = z), color = "red") +
  labs(title = "CDF vs. PDF",
       x = "x",
       y = "Density") +
  theme_minimal()



```
